attributes.action: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCE SHOULD THE NHS BE PRIVATISED
attributes.additional_details: The Government should consult with the British Tax payer with regards to any failing of the NHS and in that if a rescue plan was needed then every opportunity should be considered to keep the NHS funded by the tax payer and not by a for profit private organisation
attributes.background: The NHS provides Free Health care for all and under no circumstance should this be privatised or taken away from the people that may otherwise not be able to afford Private Insurance.
